features: Package includes 30 stationery writing papers with 18 envelopes in 6 beautiful patterns.

Mr. Pen stationery writing papers are made of quality material. Letter writing papers and envelopes are compatible with inkjet or laser printers. Perfect for use with ballpoint pens, gel pens, fountain pens, pencils, etc.
Each stationery paper measures 10 x 7.3 inches, and the stationery envelope is about 8.5 x 4.3 inches.

Mr. Pen stationery writing papers are perfect for those who love to write handwritten letters. The letter writing paper with some decoration at the corner and a slightly colored background makes calligraphy or writing clear but elegant and impressive.
Our stationery papers and envelopes are suitable for letter writing, also nice as party invitations, blessing messages, holiday letters, home decoration, and decoration letters in daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty stationary. Nice quality paper
reviews.reviewText: The designs are nice. The printing is clean. Design and coloring does not overpower writing. There is no noticeable coating on the paper, so writing with fountain pen or ball pen works well without "slippery" spots. Even on printed area.Works well with fountain pen ink without bleeding or feathering (spreading) and ink dries fairly quickly without smudging.One side is printed and the other side is clear. I write on the clear side to avoid bumping into rather printing.Good paper thickness and quality appropriate for letter writing.The box is attractive.Makes a good gift with the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, well made stationery
reviews.reviewText: Lovely design and sturdy construction for an excellent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Different styles that work for many uses
reviews.reviewText: Several styles in one pack makes it a great gift for yourself and others. easy to write on or used in your printer. Beautiful set and the envelopes match the papers. there are more pages than there are envelops so its nice to have a spare!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were for my daughter to pen-pal. The envelopes are not the standard. They are the standard shape but they open from the short end. These are not normal US type of envelopes. I’m not sure that was clear to me as the consumer. My daughter loves them. Good quality. VERY PRETTY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Strong, durable paper, along with exquisite designs also matching envelopes with the different styles of Japanese pictures. I especially love that this brand has a larger size letter providing an easy to send envelopes that you have an easy length in folding letter that fits inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for writing letters to loved ones, this is a great variety pack for all year round! I used the evergreen tree papers to write holiday letters but I can't wait to use the rest. Having it come with their own matching envelopes for mailing is a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The design and paper is exquisite. Love the unique envelopes. Bought it as a present for someone, admired it so much I bought it for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality ,. Very nice
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoyed and will last a long time. Thx. S. Janice
